00036 
00037 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_LDLM
00038 #include <libcfs/libcfs.h>
00039 
00040 #include <lustre_dlm.h>
00041 #include <lustre_lib.h>
00042 
00051 struct ldlm_resource *lock_res_and_lock(struct ldlm_lock *lock)
00052 {
00053         /* on server-side resource of lock doesn't change */
00054         if (!ldlm_is_ns_srv(lock))
00055                 spin_lock(&lock->l_lock);
00056 
00057         lock_res(lock->l_resource);
00058 
00059         ldlm_set_res_locked(lock);
00060         return lock->l_resource;
00061 }
00062 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lock_res_and_lock);
00063 
00067 void unlock_res_and_lock(struct ldlm_lock *lock)
00068 {
00069         /* on server-side resource of lock doesn't change */
00070         ldlm_clear_res_locked(lock);
00071 
00072         unlock_res(lock->l_resource);
00073         if (!ldlm_is_ns_srv(lock))
00074                 spin_unlock(&lock->l_lock);
00075 }
00076 EXPORT_SYMBOL(unlock_res_and_lock);
